TopicTitle: Prokhogorsk Air Force - Introducing my Nation's Aircraft Collection

Articles.Content:
Visit my Nation on Nationstates.net:

The Federation of Prokhogorsk

You can download the .craft files here!

Edited January 22, 2014 by TheChizzaberry81
Added .craft folder download link.

Sorry hate to be a killjoy here but isnt they a forums rule about no roleplay?

I believe that they is a completely independent forums for roleplay at http://play.kerbalroleplay.com/

And i think this counts as roleplay.

But still those are some nice looking planes.
Plenty of the "Rocket Builders" are sorta in-character, so relax and enjoy the awesome airplanes. Does Prokhogorsk export these aircraft, by any chance?

That tailfin design from the GOL-65h - just O.O

i need that for a Sci-Fi SSTO....

Sorry hate to be a killjoy here but isnt they a forums rule about no roleplay?

I believe that they is a completely independent forums for roleplay at http://play.kerbalroleplay.com/

And i think this counts as roleplay.

But still those are some nice looking planes.

Yeah I get what you mean. I'm not interested in roleplay per say here on the forums, but just to give a people and idea of why I made these planes. I'd say I worded it wrong myself, because what it really is is my friends and I governing our own nations over at nationstates.net, and I thought these planes made in KSP would be good to show over here at the forums. Thanks a lot for the reply though, and I'm glad you like them

Edited January 22, 2014 by TheChizzaberry81

That tailfin design from the GOL-65h - just O.O

i need that for a Sci-Fi SSTO....

Haha glad you like it. I'll hopefully put the planes up for download very soon depending on how many people want them.

Plenty of the "Rocket Builders" are sorta in-character, so relax and enjoy the awesome airplanes. Does Prokhogorsk export these aircraft, by any chance?

To answer your question, yes! If you go through some of my factbook at my nation (just click on my signature or 'here' at top of post), you'll find the a custom map made of the region Prokhogorsk resides in, where you can see other nations which are run by my friends. Also you can see on the grid of planes in this post, where it says 'Primary Users', there is a list of nations who use them. Some planes are cheaply priced and are used by several nations, others are quite expensive and are exclusively used only by Prokhogorsk.
